text:
JMeter can only currently be ran as a program. It would be great if you could create a distribution that was also only a library.

This would help out, for instance, the JMeter Maven Plugin:
https://github.com/Ronnie76er/jmeter-maven-plugin

The jmeter maven plugin currently uses a jar compiled without the main to get access to the functionality of jmeter.
creator: Ron.Alleva@gmail.com
sebb@apache.org
text:
Appears to be the same request as Bug 50034

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 50034 ***
